Question: This person produced most of his work between the mid-1920s and the mid-1950s, and won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1954.
Hints: Ernest Miller **** was born on July 21, 1899, in Oak Park, Illinois, a suburb of Chicago.
This person's marriage to Hadley deteriorated as he was working on The Sun Also Rises.
The theme of death permeates this person's work.
